A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars is heading in a new direction\, that’s definitely a good thing\, fans from this saga are very hard to please. This movie clearly has great cinematography \, amazing shots\, great composition\, phenomenal acting specially Mark Hamill and Adam Driver but the script in some points has it’s flaws like for example the running out of fuel following of the Resistance’s main ships and the Casino sequence could have been shortened in order to fit more Samurai-esque lightsaber showdowns and some more Force educational sequences. Also the music is not so piercing like John William’s other past soundtracks.
